summary: A bat file that adds to the inventory items containing various enchants of the game and can be disenchanted to learn their recipe.
descriptionHtml:
[color=red][b][u]Description:[/u][/b][/color]

A bat file that adds to the inventory items containing various enchants of the game and can be disenchanted to learn their recipe.


[color=red][b][u]Installation:[/u][/b][/color]

Copy the file named \"AllEnchant\" into your Skyrim installation folder:

..\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim


[color=red][b][u]In game instructions:[/u][/b][/color]

Watch my video on YouTube : [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooK-MIX-pfM]www.youtube.com/watch?v=ooK-MIX-pfM[/url]

or

1. Open the console using the console key (\"~\" or \"`\" - It\'s the key to the left of the \"1\" on your keyboard).
2. Type in the console: bat allenchant.
3. Disenchant all items added to your inventory.
author: pip99
